title: Embroidered Picture, 1950s
description: Embroidered landscape scene depicts confrontation between four medieval figures, one mounted on mail-covered horse. Top scene: man on horse faces man on foot. Bottom scene: man dismounted approaches man on foot. Rider in brilliant orange cloak with white and black stockings. The mail-covering of horse in red-brown. Man on foot in brown and purple zigzag patterned medieval tunic with bright yellow stockings. In background, tufts of pale green grass, trees of brown and blue-green and yellow-green. Inner border, black; outer border, orange.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, 1950s.Medium: silk (?), linen
Technique: embroidered. 1971-30-8.
